name: Butter Bot
description:
"A work in progress game about a sentient robot... Using thrusters to slide along butter it squirts in front of it"

This game is a work in progress but I decided to release the beta on to itch so I can get some feedback for improvements.

Change log:

0.9>>

+New level!

+Better desktop icon!

0.8>>

- First itch version, no changes.

To do:

Donations well appreciated, thank you!
